pr_title: [risk=no] Fix keyfile path for staging/perf deploys

timeline.message: [risk=no] Fix keyfile path for staging/perf deploys

timeline.bodyText:
@aweng98 for another day, but I see a lot of duplication of the working dir ~/workbench. Can that be a top-level parameter (or container-level)?
Also is there a more canonical location for some of these than the user's home directory? I have a hard time understanding who the user is with Docker, but that's probably just a lack of familiarity.
timeline.author: jaycarlton
